text.*:
This outline of open educational resources provides a way of navigating concepts and topics in relation to the open educational resources (OER) movement.

Contents

  • 1 Definitions
    • 1.1 Concepts of open
    • 1.2 Relationship to other educational concepts
    • 1.3 Goals and aims
    • 1.4 How to design learning using OER
  • 2 Tools
    • 2.1 Access and delivery
    • 2.2 Learning
    • 2.3 Licensing
  • 3 Methods/Philosophy
  • 4 Types of learning experiences
  • 5 Programs and initiatives
  • 6 Governance, policies and standards
  • 7 References
  • 8 External links
